ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAmendments to Order in Council P.C. 2004-848 which provide for (a) the appointment of the Minister of State (Infrastructure and Communities) as a member of the TREASURY BOARD; and (b) the removal of the Minister of National Revenue as a member and the Minister of Human Resources and Skills Development as an Alternate.
